column1: 721215,Grader Operator,,"Compact or smooth materials to create level bases
column3: Operate equipment or vehicles to clear construction sites or move materials
column11: Operate heavy-duty construction or installation equipment
column13: Load or unload materials used in construction or mining
column15: Signal equipment operators to indicate proper equipment positioning
column19: Locate equipment or materials in need of repair or replacement
column21: Remove debris or vegetation from work sites
column33: Review blueprints or specifications to determine work requirements
column35: Assist skilled construction or mining staff
column43: Test air quality at work sites
column45: Communicate with clients about products, procedures and policies",0.2149867701186701
